title: Atlantic Adventure cinema slide
creator_credit: Columbia Pictures and Albert S. Rogell
credit_line: ACMI has used best endeavours to remain in contact with the owners of these objects since their deposit with ACMI in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful and ACMI would welcome any information to assist identify a current contact for their ownership.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Nancy Carroll Lloyd Nolan Harry Langdon in Atlantic Adventure Not suitable for General Exhibition. A Columbia production There is worn away black handwriting on the plain glass slide which says: Next Wed, Thurs, Fri
